general.cloudNudge: This feature is already available for Jira cloud, and will be available for server soon.

error.serverNotSupported: Jira Server is not supported yet
error.microsoftLogin: Could not verify Microsoft login. Please refresh and try again.
error.atlassianLogin: Atlassian login failed. Please try again.
error.yasoonLogin: Encountered an error while processing your login. The yasoon team has been notified.
error.createIssue: Couldn't create issue, please check fields!
error.fileUpload: Some of your files appear to be invalid.
error.noUserFound: A user with email address {{email}} was not found in this service portal.
error.invalidLicense: You don't have a license for this app, or it is expired. Please check the license status in the 'Manage Apps' section.
error.portalSettingsSaveError: Could not save portal settings. Please try again later.
error.downloadJsmAppError: Could not download the app. Please try again later.
error.missingExpiredLicenseHelptext: To continue usage of this product, please renew your license.
error.chatCreationFailedExternal: Failed to create chat. Try removing external users.

officeLoginMSALScreen.heading: Re-authenticate Microsoft login
officeLoginMSALScreen.descriptionFirstLine: You need to re-authenticate. This is probably caused by your browser settings.
officeLoginMSALScreen.docLink: Show me how to fix this

fields.dropzoneHelptext: Drop files or click to select
fields.userFieldNoResults: We couldn't find a matching user.
fields.issueFieldPreFilledTooltip: This issue was selected based on issues already linked to this conversation.

teams.noMatchingIssue: We couldn't find a matching issue.
teams.noMatchingIssueType: We couldn't find a matching issue type.
teams.noMatchingProject: We couldn't find a matching project.
teams.addBotToUseAction: To use this action, please add the app to this team first.
teams.jiraAppHelpText: To use this app, please install or update the Jira app from the Atlassian Marketplace first.
teams.chatLinkingHelpText: This group chat will be fully linked to the selected issue, linking a single message is currently only supported in channels.
teams.connectToJiraCloudHelpText: To connect to Jira Cloud, we are going to link your Teams and Jira account. We'll first prompt you to login with Microsoft and immediately afterwards continue to Jira!
teams.connectToJiraHelpText: Please choose your Jira, or let us detect it for you!
teams.provideJiraInstanceUrl: Please provide the Url of your Jira instance. We check if a connection is possible
teams.unsupportedActionHelpText: Unfortunately this action is not supported in chats yet. Please get in touch in case you need this function.

createIssueSuccessScreen.heading: Issue created successfully
createIssueSuccessScreen.description: The issue {link} has been created successfully. You can now view this issue in Jira.

boardView.necessaryForBusinessBoards: This is only necessary for business boards
boardView.columnOrderPriority: Drag and drop statuses in the order you want to see them on the board
boardView.configureLoginRequired: To configure this board, a login with Jira is required.
boardView.loginRequiredForTransitions: To perform issue status transitions, a login is required
boardView.startNewConversationDescription: Start a new conversation in the current channel
boardView.relatedChatsDescription: Chat related to the current issue
boardView.issueNotOnBoard: Looks like this issue is not on the board anymore
boardView.noIssuesOnBoard: Looks like there are no issues on your board.
boardView.viewBoardLoginRequired: To see this board, a login with Jira is required.
boardView.boardLoginRequired: You'll need to login to use this app.
boardView.loginWithButtonBelow: Use the button below to connect to your Jira account.
boardView.loginToCreateIssue: You need to login to create issues
boardView.loginToAssignIssue: You need to login to assign issues
boardView.loginToTransitionIssue: You need to login to change the status of issues
boardView.wrongInstance1: The Jira instance you are logged in to is different from the one this board belongs to, and no sharing was configured.
boardView.wrongInstance2: Please log out using the user menu in the top right corner, then log in to the correct Jira instance to view this board.

support.contactUsHelpText: If you have a specific technical problem or want to learn about our app, we're happy to help.
support.checkDocumentationHelpText: We've collected everything important for you in the app support portal. Use the quick links below.
support.useCasesHelpText: We have compiled a list of use cases to give you a head start.
